trends: There has been one other sighting in Edgewater
There were no other sightings in Edgewater on or around November 6th 2011
divs: Sighting Details1. Where were you and what were you doing at the time? We were driving southbound Rt. 2, then eastbound Rt. 214 in Edgewater, MD. 2. What made you first notice the object? There were very bright lights in the sky. 4-5 clusters of white lights. Pretty low, some of them just above the treeline. One witness remembers them being all in a straight line. 3. What did you think the object was when you first noticed it? Maybe an airplane, but then realized that the objects were not moving at all-just hovering. 4. Describe the object and its actions and motions in detail. The objects stayed stationary the entire time. Then one disappeared out of nowhere. Slowly the rest disappeared one by one. 5. Describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object. We were very intrigued and couldn���t stop staring as we were driving. 6. How did you lose sight of the object? The objects disappeared one by one.
Summary: Bright Lights in the Sky: Edgewater, MD 21037
